CustomField.description: Age with Scrum Team is the difference between now and the last time the Scrum Team field was modified. This calculation excludes weekends.
CustomField.formula: IF(ISNULL(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c), null, CASE(MOD( TODAY() - DATE(1985,6,24),7), 0 , CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) ,7),1,0,2,0,3,1,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 1 , CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) ,7),1,1,2,1,3,1,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 2 , CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) ,7),1,1,2,2,3,2,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 3 , CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) ,7),1,1,2,2,3,3,4,3,5,3,6,4,0), 4 , CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) ,7),1,1,2,2,3,3,4,4,5,4,6,4,0), 5 , CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) ,7),1,0,2,1,3,2,4,3,5,4,6,0,0), 6 , CASE( MOD( TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) ,7),1,0,2,0,3,1,4,2,5,3,6,4,0), 999) + (FLOOR(( TODAY() - DATEVALUE(Scrum_Team_Last_Modified__c) )/7)*5) )
CustomField.inlineHelpText: Age with Scrum Team is the difference between now and the last time the Scrum Team field was modified. This calculation excludes weekends.
CustomField.label: Age With Scrum Team
